effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect.sun-moon: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

flavor_text.sun-moon: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
